docs.snippet: Online book retailer Amazon.com Inc said on Monday it has signed a multi-year deal with Simon & Schuster Inc, the second Big-Five book publisher, on the future price of e-books....

headline.main: Amazon Strikes Deal With Simon & Schuster on e-Book Prices
headline.print_headline: Amazon Strikes Deal With Simon & Schuster on e-Book Prices

docs.lead_paragraph: Online book retailer Amazon.com Inc said on Monday it has signed a multi-year deal with Simon & Schuster Inc, the second Big-Five book publisher, on the future price of e-books.

docs.snippet: China's M&A watchdog is getting much faster at approving both domestic and foreign deals, cutting legal costs for companies and marking a shift in the outlook of a regulator that has been a thorn in the side of bankers since its crea...

headline.main: Shorter Wait-China's M&A Watchdog Halves Time Taken to Approve Deals
headline.print_headline: Shorter Wait-China's M&A Watchdog Halves Time Taken to Approve Deals

docs.lead_paragraph: China's M&A watchdog is getting much faster at approving both domestic and foreign deals, cutting legal costs for companies and marking a shift in the outlook of a regulator that has been a thorn in the side of bankers since its creation.

headline.print_headline: UPS Increases Some Shipping Rates by 4.9 Percent

docs.snippet: U.S. stock prices moved quietly higher Monday as investors decided to step back into a market that was rattled by turbulence last week. A decline in IBM held back a gain in the Dow Jones industrial average. IBM fell 7 percent after it reported qua...

headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Monday
headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Did Monday

docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. stock prices moved quietly higher Monday as investors decided to step back into a market that was rattled by turbulence last week. A decline in IBM held back a gain in the Dow Jones industrial average. IBM fell 7 percent after it reported quarterly results that missed analysts' expectations. The company also cut its earnings outlook.

docs.snippet: Japan's convenience store operators are jostling for eminence in a famously cut-throat industry, and one product has come up trumps for the market's top players - coffee....

headline.main: Japan's Java Wars: Convenience Stores Angle for Coffee Market Crown
headline.print_headline: Japan's Java Wars: Convenience Stores Angle for Coffee Market Crown

docs.lead_paragraph: Japan's convenience store operators are jostling for eminence in a famously cut-throat industry, and one product has come up trumps for the market's top players - coffee.

docs.snippet: China's economic growth slowed in the third quarter to its weakest since the 2008/09 global financial crisis as a slumping property market dragged on manufacturing and investment, adding to concerns about flagging global growth....

headline.main: China Posts Slowest Growth Since Global Crisis, More Stimulus Expected
headline.print_headline: China Posts Slowest Growth Since Global Crisis, More Stimulus Expected

docs.lead_paragraph: China's economic growth slowed in the third quarter to its weakest since the 2008/09 global financial crisis as a slumping property market dragged on manufacturing and investment, adding to concerns about flagging global growth.

headline.print_headline: U.S. Congress Examining Deal Between NSA Official, Ex-Agency Chief

docs.lead_paragraph: A Senate committee and an outspoken U.S. Congressman are seeking further information about a deal under which a top National Security Agency official is being permitted to work part-time for a private company run by the spy agency's former director.
